name: 악마의 암초
text:
쉬움 / 보통
[skull]: -X. X는 조사자들이 조종하는 열쇠 개수 총합입니다.
[cultist]: -2. 이번 능력 테스트가 [[심해인]] 적을 대상으로 한 공격/회피 시도였고 이번 테스트가 실패했다면, 그 적이 당신과 교전합니다. (그 적이 이미 당신과 교전 중인 상태라면, 우선 그 적이 당신과의 교전을 풀고, 그런 다음 재교전합니다.)
[tablet]: -3. 당신이 탑승물에 있지 않고 이번 테스트가 실패했다면, 피해를 1 받습니다.
[elder_thing]: -4. 당신이 위치한 장소에 열쇠가 놓여있고 이번 테스트가 실패했다면, 공포를 1 받습니다.
back_text:
어려움 / 전문가
[skull]: -X. X는 조사자들이 조종하는 열쇠 개수 총합+1입니다.
[cultist]: -3. 이번 능력 테스트가 심해인 적을 대상으로 한 공격/회피 시도였다면, 그 적이 당신과 교전합니다. (그 적이 이미 당신과 교전 중인 상태라면, 우선 그 적이 당신과의 교전을 풀고, 그런 다음 재교전합니다.)
[tablet]: -4. 당신이 탑승물에 있지 않으면, 피해를 1 받습니다.
[elder_thing]: -5. 당신이 위치한 장소에 열쇠가 놓여있다면, 공포를 1 받습니다.

flavor: The sailors along the docks of Innsmouth eye you with suspicion as you depart. The lighthouse beacon at the top of the nearby cliffside provides your only illumination as you head deeper into the fog.
name: 바다의 비밀 (v. I)
text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.

flavor: "It's got us in its grip! It ain't goin' nowhere. Now's your chance!"
name: 악마의 암초에 도사린 공포
text: Spawn - Fishing Vessel's location. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter [[Cave]] locations. The Terror of Devil Reef gets +3 [per_investigator] health.

flavor: The sailors along the docks of Innsmouth eye you with suspicion as you depart. The lighthouse beacon at the top of the nearby cliffside provides your only illumination as you head deeper into the fog.
name: 바다의 비밀 (v. II)
text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.

name: 악마의 암초에 도사린 공포
text: Spawn - Fishing Vessel's location. Hunter. Massive. Retaliate. The Terror of Devil Reef cannot enter [[Cave]] locations. Forced - When The Terror of Devil Reef would be defeated: Instead, remove all damage from it and exhaust it. It cannot ready for the remainder of the round (including the upkeep phase).

flavor: Now you know why none dare venture near the black reefs. It's not just the strange sightings on the islands - there is something far older and more horrifying that dwells under the waves...
name: 바닷속에 도사린 악마
text: As an additional cost for you to move from one [[Ocean]] location to another while not in a vehicle, you must spend 2 actions. Forced - When your turn begins, if you are at a fully flooded location, you struggle for air: When your turn ends, if you did not enter an unflooded location, partially flooded location, or a vehicle during your turn, take 5 direct damage.
back_flavor:
"We've gotta pull back!" Mr. Moore shouts over the roar of the waves. "The sea's too rough, and the tide's gettin' worse by the minute! Stay out here any longer an' we'll capsize fer sure!"
You protest, but the captain is right. The weather has gotten so bad Mr. Moore can barely control the ship. Worse yet, in just a matter of hours the tide has begun to swallow the coastal islands, leaving little for you to investigate. You nod to the captain, frustrated. This will have to do for now.
back_text: Record in your Campaign Log the tide has grown stronger. (→R1)

flavor: Somewhere in these accursed reefs, the Esoteric Order of Dagon is hiding something big... but what?
name: 불가사의한 암초
text: Keys can only be claimed from [[Y'ha-nthlei]] locations using the [free] ability on those locations. Objective - Find and claim as many of the following keys as you can from [[Y'ha-nthlei]] locations (purple, white, and black). If you control all 3 of these keys, advance.
back_flavor: Confident that you've found enough evidence of the Order's activities, you head back to the coast. You'd much rather continue your investigation on dry land.

name: 휘몰아치는 해역
text: [action] If you are in the Fishing Vessel: Resign. Each investigator in the Fishing Vessel resigns. Remove Fishing Vessel from the game. Each resigning investigator places each of their purple, black, or white keys on the current act. All other investigators are left to fend for themselves.
back_flavor: "And far out at sea, despite a high tide, I glimpsed a long, black line scarcely rising above the water yet carrying a suggestion of odd latent malignancy." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>
back_text: Churning Waters enters play fully flooded (even while it is unrevealed).

name: 외딴 섬
text: Forced - After Lonely Isle is revealed: Put 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Lonely Isle (but not to one another).
back_flavor: "...as I glimpsed it I could not help thinking of all the hideous legends I had heard in the last twenty-four hours - legends which portrayed this ragged rock as a veritable gateway to realms of unfathomed horror and inconceivable abnormality." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 숨겨진 만
text: Forced - After you reveal Hidden Cove: Put 1 set-aside Tidal Tunnel into play adjacent to Hidden Cove, then put 1 set-aside Unfathomable Depths into play adjacent to that Tidal Tunnel.
back_flavor: "...as I glimpsed it I could not help thinking of all the hideous legends I had heard in the last twenty-four hours - legends which portrayed this ragged rock as a veritable gateway to realms of unfathomed horror and inconceivable abnormality." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 해식도
text: Forced - After you reveal Waveworn Island: Increase its flood level. Put 1 random set-aside Unfathomable Depths and 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Waveworn Island (but not to one another).
back_flavor:
"...as I glimpsed it I could not help thinking of all the hideous legends I had heard in the last twenty-four hours - legends which portrayed this ragged rock as a veritable gateway to realms of unfathomed horror and inconceivable abnormality."
- H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 염습지
text: [action] If you control the purple key: Look at the revealed side of any Tidal Tunnels or Unfathomable Depths location in play. (Group limit once per game.) Forced - After you reveal Salt Marshes: Increase its flood level. Put 1 random set-aside Tidal Tunnel into play adjacent to Salt Marshes.
back_flavor:
"...as I glimpsed it I could not help thinking of all the hideous legends I had heard in the last twenty-four hours - legends which portrayed this ragged rock as a veritable gateway to realms of unfathomed horror and inconceivable abnormality."
- H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 검은 암초
text: Forced - After you reveal Black Reef: Increase its flood level. Put 2 random set-aside Tidal Tunnels into play, each adjacent to Black Reef (but not to one another). Then, put 1 random set-aside Unfathomable Depths into play adjacent to both of those Tidal Tunnels.
back_flavor:
"...as I glimpsed it I could not help thinking of all the hideous legends I had heard in the last twenty-four hours - legends which portrayed this ragged rock as a veritable gateway to realms of unfathomed horror and inconceivable abnormality."
- H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 밀주업자의 은닉처
text: Forced - After Bootlegger's Hideaway is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Bootlegger's Hideaway without looking at it. [action] If you control the white key: Draw 3 cards. (Group limit once per game.)
back_flavor: The air is frigid here, and there is no sound but the faint plinking of water dripping onto the rough stone ground. You shudder and proceed onward...

name: 밀주업자의 은닉처
text: Forced - After Bootlegger's Hideaway is revealed: Randomly choose 1 of the set-aside facedown keys and place it on Bootlegger's Hideaway without looking at it. [action] If you control the black key: Gain 5 resources. (Group limit once per game.)
back_flavor: The air is frigid here, and there is no sound but the faint plinking of water dripping onto the rough stone ground. You shudder and proceed onward...

name: 심해인 암굴
text: Forced - After this location is revealed: Increase its flood level. Place the set-aside purple key on it. [free] If investigators at this location control both the red key and the blue key and spend 2 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Take control of the purple key and read Flashback IX in the Campaign Guide.
back_flavor:
"They had all kinds o' cities on the sea-bottom, an' this island was heaved up from thar."
- H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 심해인 암굴
text: Forced - After this location is revealed: Increase its flood level. Place the set-aside purple key on it. [free] If investigators at this location control both the green key and the yellow key and spend 3 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Take control of the purple key and read Flashback IX in the Campaign Guide.
back_flavor: "They had all kinds o' cities on the sea-bottom, an' this island was heaved up from thar." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 거석 유적
text: Forced - After this location is revealed: It becomes fully flooded. Place the set-aside white key on it. [free] If investigators at this location control both the red key and the yellow key and spend 2 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Take control of the white key and read Flashback X in the Campaign Guide.
back_flavor:
"They had all kinds o' cities on the sea-bottom, an' this island was heaved up from thar."
 - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 거석 유적
text: Forced - After this location is revealed: It becomes fully flooded. Place the set-aside white key on it. [free] If investigators at this location control both the blue key and the green key and spend 3 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Take control of the white key and read Flashback X in the Campaign Guide.
back_flavor: "They had all kinds o' cities on the sea-bottom, an' this island was heaved up from thar." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 결합의 신전
text: Forced - After this location is revealed: Place the set-aside black key on it. [free] If investigators at this location control both the red key and the green key and spend 2 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Take control of the black key and read Flashback XI in the Campaign Guide.
back_flavor: "They had all kinds o' cities on the sea-bottom, an' this island was heaved up from thar." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 결합의 신전
text: Forced - After this location is revealed: Place the set-aside black key on it. [free] If investigators at this location control both the blue key and the yellow key and spend 3 [per_investigator] clues, as a group: Take control of the black key and read Flashback XI in the Campaign Guide.
back_flavor: "They had all kinds o' cities on the sea-bottom, an' this island was heaved up from thar." - H. P. Lovecraft, <u>The Shadow over Innsmouth</u>

name: 어선
text:
Vehicle.
While you are in this vehicle, treat your location as if it were unflooded.
[action]: Move Fishing Vessel to a connecting [[Ocean]] location.

name: 파도에 닳은 우상
text: [reaction] After your location's flood level changes, or after a [[Deep One]] enemy spawns at your location, exhaust Waveworn Idol: Immediately take an action as if it were your turn (this action does not count toward the number of actions you can take each turn).

name: 깨어난 망토
text: [free] If your location is flooded, exhaust Awakened Mantle: Move to a connecting location that is also flooded.

name: 이하 느틀레이의 머리관
text: You get +1 skill value while investigating a flooded location or while attacking or evading an enemy at a flooded location.

name: 심해인 포식자
text: Hunter. Forced - After Deep One Predator engages you: Move 1 of your clues or keys to Deep One Predator. Forced - When you defeat or evade Deep One Predator: Take control of all of its clues and keys.

name: 심해인 추적자
text: Hunter. While Hunting Deep One is engaged with you, you cannot enter vehicles or gain resources. Forced - After Hunting Deep One engages you: If you are not in a vehicle, lose 2 resources. If you are in a vehicle, leave your vehicle.

name: 물 속에 있는 형체
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (2). If you fail, take 2 horror. This test gets +1 difficulty if your location is flooded (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).

name: 수중 잠복
text: Revelation - Put Aquatic Ambush into play next to the agenda deck. Forced - When you reveal a chaos token while attacking an enemy at a flooded location: Reveal an additional chaos token. (Max once per test.) Forced - At the end of the round: Discard 1 copy of Aquatic Ambush from play. (Max once per round.)

name: 심해에서 올라온 공포
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (2). If you fail, take 2 damage. This test gets +1 difficulty if your location is flooded (+2 difficulty instead if it is fully flooded).

name: 밀항자
text: Revelation - If no investigators are in a vehicle, Stowaway gains surge. Otherwise, each investigator in a vehicle must either take 1 damage and 1 horror or leave that vehicle. Each investigator who left a vehicle cannot enter that vehicle for the remainder of the round.

name: 끌려 들어가다
text: Revelation - Put Dragged Under into play in your threat area. If you are in a vehicle, leave it. You cannot enter vehicles. [action]: Test [combat] (3) or [agility] (3). If you succeed, discard Dragged Under.
